item.title: The amazing material that empowers you to become your own industrial designer
item.description:
Jane NÃ­ Dhulchaointigh. Source: sugru Have you ever wished you could slightly modify an item you use frequently? Maybe you need a phone bumper, want to reshape something to fit your hand better, or need to reinforce a wire where it’s prone to breaking? Sugru might be the solution you’ve been looking for. Over 300,000 people worldwide have already purchased it, and Forbes.com has dubbed it the “21st Century Duct Tape...
